titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the work opportunity tax credit for employers of certain veterans.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the work opportunity tax credit for employers of certain veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2012 the work opportunity tax credit for the hiring of unemployed veterans.
